tags.name: Sales Order Item Pricing Elmnt Sim (API)
Value Added Service for SO Simulation

post.summary: Simulates the creation of a sales order.
post.description: Simulates the creation of a sales order, including price calculation with results, Available-to-Promise (ATP) check, partner determination, and credit check.

tags: Value Added Service for SO Simulation

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).
